leftSection_5.title: From Idea to Office — How We Simplify Your UAE Business Setup in 6 Simple Steps

items.title: Tell Us Your Needs
items.description: We’ll start by discussing your business goals, whether you’re launching, relocating, or expanding in the UAE. Our experts understand your vision and recommend the best office solution tailored to your setup requirements.

items.title: Choose Your Ideal Office Plan
items.description: From cost-efficient co-working spaces to furnished private offices, select a workspace that fits your operations, team size, and budget. We’ll guide you through each option to ensure compliance with UAE regulations.

items.title: Get Your Business Setup Support
items.description: Next, we handle every part of your business setup, from trade licensing to PRO services, integrating everything into your office solution for a smooth, cost-efficient, and hassle-free setup journey.

items.title: Finalise Documentation & Approvals
items.description: Once you select your package, we’ll prepare and submit all necessary documentation to the relevant authorities. Our in-house team ensures your approvals are fast, accurate, and stress-free.

items.title: Move In or Go Virtual
items.description: Start working immediately in your new office, at your flex desk, or through your virtual address. We'll ensure everything is ready for you, from Wi-Fi to reception services, so you can focus on running your business.

items.title: Grow & Scale with One Nexuz
items.description: After you’ve moved in, our experts help you plan for growth! Upgrade your plan, add team desks, or expand to new locations across the Emirates- all while keeping the same trusted partner by your side.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What type of office solutions are available in the UAE?
items.answer: The UAE offers several flexible workspace options, including virtual offices, flexi-desks (smart desks), co-working spaces, and private or physical offices, empowering you to pick the best-fit corporate office solution.

items.question: Do I need to rent or lease an office space to get a UAE business license?
items.answer: Yes, an approved office space or address is mandatory for most UAE Mainland and Free Zone licenses. Your office type also determines your visa quotas and helps ensure compliance with the DED or Free Zone Authority.

items.question: What’s the difference between a virtual office and a physical office?
items.answer: A virtual office provides a legal business address and administrative support without the need for a physical workspace, whereas a physical office offers a dedicated area for your team to work, meet clients, and operate daily.

items.question: Can I upgrade my office solution as my business grows?
items.answer: Absolutely! One of the biggest advantages of flexible office solutions is scalability. You can start small, with a flexi-desk or virtual office, and seamlessly upgrade to a physical office as your business expands.

items.question: How can an office solution support my business setup in the UAE?
items.answer: Renting or leasing an office space can streamline your setup by providing a verified address- a necessary step for licensing and visa processing. Most come with built-in support, including mail handling and reception services, helping you start operations quickly.
